Text: WSCC Standards AnnouncementCORRESPONDENTS WESTERN MARKET INTERFACE COMMITTEE COMPLIANCE PROCESS TASK FORCE OPERATIONS COMMITTEE AND OC SUBCOMMITTEE PLANNING COORDINATION COMMITTEE AND PCC SUBCOMMITTEES In accordance with the WSCC Process for Developing and Approving WSCC Standards this document has been posted for comment on the WSCC Web site filesacbpwsdppdf Please note that this WSCC ISAS ETag Business Practices posting differs from the ISAS Business Practices posting of July The latter posting is in the day preOC ballot phase of the Standards Development process Please provide any comments by October Comments should be made via email to LINDA ELDER ADMINISTRATIVE COORDINATOR PH FX EM

Standards NotificationCORRESPONDENTS WESTERN MARKET INTERFACE COMMITTEE COMPLIANCE PROCESS TASK FORCE OPERATIONS COMMITTEE AND OC SUBCOMMITTEES PLANNING COORDINATION COMMITTEE AND PCC SUBCOMMITTEES In accordance with the WSCC Process for Developing and Approving WSCC Standards the WSCC Operations Network WON Security Policy has been posted for comment on the WSCC Web site filesWONSecurityPolicypdf Comments should be made via email to LINDA ELDER ADMINISTRATIVE COORDINATOR PH FX EM

Standards Announcement Determination of Available Transfer CapaCORRESPONDENTS WESTERN MARKET INTERFACE COMMITTEE COMPLIANCE PROCESS TASK FORCE OPERATIONS COMMITTEE AND OC SUBCOMMITTEES PLANNING COORDINATION COMMITTEE AND PCC SUBCOMMITTEES In accordance with the WSCC Process for Developing and approving WSCC Standards the Determination of Available Transfer Capability Within the Western Interconnection both Clean and Redline versions have been posted for approval on the WSCC Web site filesATCmethodolgyRLpdf filesATCmethodolgyCLpdf Since this document has not met the day posting requirement prior to approval a Background Paper has also been posted at filesATCpostingbackgroundpdf Approval of the document will be requested at the October WMIC meeting LINDA ELDER ADMINISTRATIVE COORDINATOR PH FX EM
